description: Bournemouth 1-0 Everton: Andoni Iraola's top-four poser
title: Bournemouth 1-0 Everton: Andoni Iraola's top-four poser
title_page: Bournemouth 1-0 Everton: Andoni Iraola's top-four poser - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bournemouth have sailed through this season, but are now in unchartered territory.
The Cherries have never had more than the 33 points they have accumulated from 20 Premier League games this season.
It's left the club's supporters dreaming of European football and, whisper it quietly, even the prospect of qualifying for the Champions League.
A stern examination of those credentials will come over the course of the next month or so.
Chelsea, Newcastle, Forest and Liverpool are next up in the Premier League for the Andoni Iraola's side - four games against four teams currently occupying positions in the top five.
Iraola's players were relaxed against Everton as they patiently waited for a winner.
But the stakes will be higher against jostling to finish in the top four which could present Iraola with a dilemma on how to approach the matches.
Pragmatically keep themselves in the hunt, or seize the moment to achieve something truly special.
It should prove to be an intriguing few weeks.
